doc.title: The Trophy Case
doc.plot: What if, what starts out as a series of murders inspired by the nine levels of hell in Dante's Inferno, catapults a street wise city cop into wilderness survival, while tracking a sadistic taxidermist who uses the skins of his victims to create his own guide out of hell, the angel, Beatrice. Would he be able to solve the case if he's up against a serial killer with wilderness survival skills?
